edu.cpp.cs.cs141.finalProject

Class Spy

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cpp.cs.cs141.finalProject.Square
      • edu.cpp.cs.cs141.finalProject.Spy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Spy
extends Square
    The Spy Class represents the player. It inherits the symbol and position from the Square class.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
